name: Project AURA
description: Project Aura is a micro management game where you lead a Colony of Climate Disaster Survivors. You have been assigned the mission to build an habitat capable of survival in this new unknown world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8.1, 10 (64-bit) Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA card, 1GB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Any OpenAL compatible Additional Notes: We recommend a resolution of at least 1600x900 or similar.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8.1, 10 (64-bit) Processor: 3 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA card, 2GB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Any OpenAL compatible Additional Notes: For the best play experience, we recommend a resolution of 1920x1080 (Full HD) or similar.
